text: Max Leiva (born 17 January 1966) is a Guatemalan former cyclist. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Guatemalan male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Guatemala Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Max Leiva
